item.description: The Humanist Association of Massachusetts has invited us to join them for an equinoctial brunch, in order that the two groups, Atheist Meet Up & HAM, might get to know each other a bit, see if we can develop a connection and see where things go from there. In addition to the usual casual chatting throughout, they suggest we discuss the topic of how to draw new members to secular organizations. At the end of the brunch they'll have a brief discussion of what everybody has come up with and see where that leads us.
item.name: Humanist Equinox Brunch
